page.title: 03Housing in Westerhope.
page.content: Most houses in the area are fairly new and have been built since 1945. The older areas, built around 1900, are Beaumont and Rogerson Terrace and have recently been modernised. Newbiggin Hall and Hillheads were built in the 1950's, while Chapel House and Whorlton were built around the 1960's. Chapel Park and St. John's were built in the 1970's. A typical{three-bedroomed house}has a kitchen, bathroom and toilet. Some houses have open-plan lounge-dining rooms while in others, they are separate. The bedrooms vary from larger double rooms to small nursery or box rooms. Many houses have a garage and utility room. Some houses have had{home {improvements}such as double glazing and cavity wall insulation or an ex- tention to provide extra living space.
